trans-unit.source: Calculate the difference between two Dates (and time) using PHP. The following page provides a range of different methods (7 in total) for performing date / time calculations using PHP, to determine the difference in time (hours, munites), days, months or years between two dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PHP 计算两个日期(和时间)之间的时间差。下面的页面提供了一系列使用PHP进行日期时间计算的不同方法(共7种),以确定两个日期之间的时间(小时、月、日、月或年的差值)。

trans-unit.source: Code:
trans-unit.target: Code:

trans-unit.source: Despite all that, I've decided to address the complaints. If you truly need an exact range but haven't got access to PHP 5.3, use the code below (it should work in PHP 4 as well). This is a direct port of the code that PHP uses internally to calculate ranges, with the exception that it doesn't take daylight savings time into account. That means that it's off by an hour at most, but except for that it should be correct.
trans-unit.target: 尽管如此,我还是决定解决这些抱怨。如果你真的需要一个准确的范围,但还没有使用 PHP 5.3,请使用下面的代码(在 PHP 4 中应该也可以使用)。这是对 PHP 内部计算范围的代码的直接移植,只是它没有考虑到夏令时。这意味着它最多偏离了一个小时,但除此之外,它应该是正确的。

trans-unit.source: Example usage:
trans-unit.target: 用例:

trans-unit.source: For example CodeIgniter has the timespan() function. Simply input two Unix timestamps and it will automatically generate a result like this:
trans-unit.target: 例如，CodeIgniter具有 timespan() 函数。只需输入两个Unix时间戳，它将自动生成如下结果：

trans-unit.source: For example, the difference (as returned by the above function) between 2013-02-09 and 2013-02-14 is 5. But the number of days or dates represented by the date range 2013-02-09 - 2013-02-14 is 6.
For more info read PHP date_diff manual
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请阅读PHP date_diff 手册

trans-unit.target: 对于PHP版本> = 5.3：创建两个日期对象，然后使用 date_diff() 函数。它将返回php DateInterval对象。参见文档

trans-unit.source: I found myself working on a similar problem - which is how I got to this question in the first place - but just needed a difference in hours. But my function solved this one pretty nicely as well and I don't have anywhere in my own library to keep it where it won't get lost and forgotten, so... hope this is useful to someone.
trans-unit.target: 我发现自己也在研究一个类似的问题----这就是我一开始就遇到这个问题的原因----但只是需要一个时差。但我的函数也很好地解决了这个问题,而且我在自己的图书馆里没有地方可以把它放在不会丢失和遗忘的地方,所以...........希望这对谁有用。

trans-unit.source: I wanted a function to display differences from seconds to years (just one unit). For periods over 1 day, I wanted it to rollover at midnight (10am Monday seen from 9am Wednesday is 2 days ago, not 1). And for periods over a month, I wanted the rollover to be on the same day of the month (including for 30/31 day months & leap years).
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我想要一个函数来显示从几秒到几年的差异（仅一个单位）。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">对于1天以上的时间段，我希望它在午夜滚动（星期一10am从星期三9am开始是2天，而不是1天）。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">对于一个月以上的时间段，我希望将过渡时间设置在该月的同一天（包括30/31天的月份和leap年）。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: I would prefer to use date_create and date_diff objects.
trans-unit.target: 我更喜欢使用 date_create 和 date_diff 对象。

trans-unit.source: If you use floor method of php instead of ceil it will return you the round fraction down. Please check the difference here, some times if your staging servers timezone is different then the live site time zone in that case you may get different results so change the conditions accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用php的 floor 方法而不是 ceil,它将返回给你的是向下的整数。请检查这里的差异,有些时候,如果您的暂存服务器的时区和实时网站的时区不一样,那么您可能会得到不同的结果,所以请改变相应的条件。

trans-unit.source: If your start and end dates are in string format then use
trans-unit.target: 如果你的开始和结束日期是字符串格式,那么请使用

trans-unit.source: It doesn't matter which date is earlier or later when you pass in the date parameters. The function uses the PHP ABS() absolute value to always return a postive number as the number of days between the two dates.
trans-unit.target: 当你传入日期参数时,哪个日期是早一点还是晚一点并不重要。该函数使用PHP ABS()绝对值,总是返回一个postive number作为两个日期之间的天数。

trans-unit.source: It runs two loops; the first one deals with the relative intervals (years and months) via brute-forcing, and the second one computes the additional absolute intervals with simple arithmetic (so it's faster):
trans-unit.target: 它运行两个循环,第一个循环是通过蛮力计算相对区间(年和月),第二个循环是用简单的算术计算额外的绝对区间(所以速度更快)。

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that the number of days between the two dates is NOT inclusive of both dates. So if you are looking for the number of days represented by all the dates between and including the dates entered, you will need to add one (1) to the result of this function.
trans-unit.target: 请记住,两个日期之间的天数并不包括这两个日期。所以,如果你要找的是两个日期之间的天数,你需要在这个函数的结果中加一(1)。

trans-unit.source: More info here http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.5/en/date-and-time-functions.html#function_datediff
trans-unit.target: 此处的更多信息http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.5/zh-CN/date-and-time-functions.html#function_datediff

trans-unit.source: Note that it's for PHP 5.3.0 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 注意是针对PHP5.3.0或更高的版本。

trans-unit.source: Several people in the comments have pointed out that the code above is only an approximation. I still believe that for most purposes that's fine, since the usage of a range is more to provide a sense of how much time has passed or remains rather than to provide precision - if you want to do that, just output the date.
trans-unit.target: 有几个人在评论中指出,上面的代码只是一个近似值。我仍然认为,对于大多数目的来说,这很好,因为范围的使用更多的是为了提供一种时间已经过去或还剩多少时间的感觉,而不是提供精确性--如果你想这样做,只需输出日期即可。

trans-unit.source: The DateTime object will accept any format strtotime() would. If an even more specific date format is needed, DateTime::createFromFormat() can be used to create the DateTime object.
trans-unit.target: 该 DateTime 对象将接受任何形式 strtotime() 会。如果需要更特定的日期格式，则可以使用 DateTime::createFromFormat() 创建 DateTime 对象。

trans-unit.source: The best course of action is using PHP's DateTime (and DateInterval) objects. Each date is encapsulated in a DateTime object, and then a difference between the two can be made:
trans-unit.target: 最好的做法是使用PHP的 DateTime （和 DateInterval ）对象。每个日期都封装在 DateTime 对象中，然后可以使两者之间有所不同：

你也可以使用下面的代码来返回日期差,用四舍五入的方式返回日期差 $date1=$duedate;/分配到期日期 echo $date2=date("Y-m-d");/当前日期 $ts1=strtotime($date1);$ts2=strtotime($date2);$seconds_diff=$ts1-$ts2;echo $datediff=ceil((($seconds_diff3600)24);/返回单位为天

trans-unit.source: You can use strtotime() to convert two dates to unix time and then calculate the number of seconds between them. From this it's rather easy to calculate different time periods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用strtotime()将两个日期转换为unix时间,然后计算它们之间的秒数。从中可以很容易计算出不同的时间段。

trans-unit.source: You can use the
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用

trans-unit.source: You can very easily remove intervals you don't want (say "week") by removing them from the $aIntervals array, or maybe adding an $aExclude parameter, or just filter them out when you output the string.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过从 $aIntervals 数组中删除不需要的间隔（例如“周”），或者添加 $aExclude 参数，或者在输出字符串时将其过滤掉，从而轻松地删除它们。
